column4: Guys it is possible for workspace to have its own files? I would like to be able to divide files as I am now able windows. You know what I mean?
not quite, what do you mean?
now you can have different windows on each workspace right?
yep i'm using 3 now
what you're talking about doesn't really make sense ??
ActionParsnip understands it
sorry i'm not sure
it sounds like you want a different filesystem for each workspace, which is weird
I want to have different files on each workspace
like, open a different folder on each workspace?
have different files on different workspace. For example. When I look on first workspace there will be media files, on second some other files..
can't you store the files in seperate folders, and have each folder for each window?
folder are shared too so its same
do you want to restrict access to files from one workspace, or just list certail files?
I think we are thinking about something else so nevermind ;)
if you just mean different shortcuts for different workspaces??
I am getting confused ;)
I want to have different files on each workspace.
how many workspaces do you have?
maybe if you rephrase the question a bit?
what do you use to view you "files"
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer_file
ok then what it sounds like is.. you want different parts of your filesystem available for seperate workspaces?
did you figure it out yet?
